docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 15--The large airfield in Asuncion, Paraguay, built at a cost of more than $2,000,000 of United States Government funds, runs the risk of being seized by Paraguay. The cessation of all United States air service to inland South America might result.
